iid.description: Internal identifier for the pipeline within the project

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the project where the pipeline belongs

sha.description: Commit SHA associated with the pipeline

source.description: Source that triggered the pipeline (e.g., web, push, schedule)

ref.description: Reference (branch or tag) for which the pipeline was triggered

status.description: Current status of the pipeline (e.g., running, passed, failed)

created_at.description: The timestamp when the pipeline was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the pipeline was last updated

web_url.description: URL to view the pipeline details on the web interface
